// disclaimer beta
ifeval::["{lifecycle}" == "beta"]
__This product will be released in {rel-date}.__
The latest version of these release notes is always available at {rn-url}.
Drafts of the general documentation can be found at {doc-url-beta}.
endif::[]

// disclaimer maintained
ifeval::["{lifecycle}" == "maintained"]
These release notes are updated periodically.
The latest version of these release notes is always available at {rn-url}.
General documentation can be found at {doc-url}.
endif::[]

// disclaimer unmaintained
ifeval::["{lifecycle}" == "unmaintained"]
__The support period for {product} {this-version} has ended.__
To keep systems secure and supported, upgrade to a current {product} version.
Before starting the upgrade, make sure to apply all maintenance updates.
endif::[]
